sense.def:
A clue to a problem, mystery, or puzzle
je nekaj, kar nam pomaga poiskati odgovor na problem, skrivnost ali uganko.

seg.quote: The clue to solving our energy problem lies in conservation.
The police searched all the houses but found no clues.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo
I haven't a clue about it
, povemo, da o nečem ničesar ne vemo.

seg.quote: I hadn't got a clue how to spell it.
